memberSignatures.value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema BuildSchema<T>(class System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary`2<class System.Type, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema> cache) cil managed

parameters.name: cache
parameters.summary:
An optional schema cache. The cache can be used to provide schemas for certain types,
            and it will also be populated as the schema is built.

returns.summary: A schema that matches the type.

typeParameters.name: T
typeParameters.summary: The type to build a schema for.
